# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


UNCLAS LA PAZ 0129

Corrected copy delete footonote

EO 12065; NA
TAGS: OTRA, BL
SUBJ: Visit of The Chase Manhattan Bank, NA

TO:
Patrick B. Blake
Vice President
The Chase Manhattan Bank, NA
TELEX: No 044-572
Bogota, Colombia

I would be pleased to meet with you and with two more officers of the bank on February 7, 1979. You can reach me at the following embassy's telephone number: 321554.

Regards,
Ralph R. Johnson
Commercial Attache
American Embassy
La Paz, Bolivia.
Boeker
